briefTitle: Study of APD421 as PONV Treatment (no Prior Prophylaxis)
officialTitle: Randomised, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Study of APD421 (Amisulpride for IV Injection) as Treatment of Established Post-operative Nausea and Vomiting, in Patients Who Have Had no Prior Prophylaxis
summary: Double-blind, randomised, parallel-group, placebo-controlled, adaptive, seamless, dose-selecting study to compare the efficacy of APD421 to placebo as treatment of established PONV, in patients who have not had prior PONV prophylaxis.

primaryOutcome.measure: Complete Response (Success of Initial PONV Treatment)
